scripts.send-original-plain: espruino dist/original.bundle.js --config SET_TIME_ON_WRITE=true --config MINIFICATION_Mangle=false --config SAVE_STORAGE_FILE=myapp --config LOAD_STORAGE_FILE=2 --config MODULE_MERGE=false --config MODULE_MINIFICATION_LEVEL=false  -p /dev/tty.usbserial-A50285BI --board PUCKJS
scripts.send-original-raw-plain: espruino src/original-ntag/app.js --config SET_TIME_ON_WRITE=true --config MINIFICATION_Mangle=false --config SAVE_STORAGE_FILE=myapp --config LOAD_STORAGE_FILE=2 --config MODULE_MERGE=false --config MODULE_MINIFICATION_LEVEL=false  -p /dev/tty.usbserial-A50285BI --board PUCKJS
scripts.send-test-plain: npm run build-test && espruino dist/test.bundle.js --config SET_TIME_ON_WRITE=true --config MINIFICATION_Mangle=false --config SAVE_STORAGE_FILE=myapp --config LOAD_STORAGE_FILE=2 --config MODULE_MERGE=false --config MODULE_MINIFICATION_LEVEL=false  -p /dev/tty.usbserial-A50285BI --board PUCKJS
scripts.send-test-raw-plain: espruino src/test/app.js --config SET_TIME_ON_WRITE=true --config MINIFICATION_Mangle=false --config SAVE_STORAGE_FILE=myapp --config LOAD_STORAGE_FILE=2 --config MODULE_MERGE=false --config MODULE_MINIFICATION_LEVEL=false  -p /dev/tty.usbserial-A50285BI --board PUCKJS
scripts.original: npm run build-original && npm run pack-original && npm run send-original
scripts.refactor: npm run build-refactor && npm run pack-refactor && npm run send-refactor
scripts.transfer-original: npm run build-original && npm run send-original
scripts.transfer-test: npm run build-test && npm run send-test
